scripts.e2e-ios-build: (cd ios && xcrun xcodebuild -scheme 'Maestro' -workspace 'Maestro.xcworkspace' -configuration Release -sdk 'iphonesimulator' -destination 'generic/platform=iOS Simulator' -derivedDataPath build)
scripts.e2e-ios-test: source .env.local && xcrun simctl install Booted ios/build/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/Maestro.app && maestro --device $E2E_IOS_DEVICE_ID test e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
scripts.e2e-ios-record: source .env.local && xcrun simctl install Booted ios/build/Build/Products/Release-iphonesimulator/Maestro.app && maestro --device $E2E_IOS_DEVICE_ID record e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
scripts.e2e-android-test: source .env.local && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk &&  maestro --device $E2E_ANDROID_DEVICE_ID test e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
scripts.e2e-android-record: source .env.local && adb install android/app/build/outputs/apk/release/app-release.apk &&  maestro --device $E2E_ANDROID_DEVICE_ID record e2e/scripts/main.e2e.yaml
scripts.flashlight-android-report: flashlight test --bundleId com.anlitz.maestro --testCommand 'npm run e2e-android-test' --duration 10000 --resultsFilePath flashlight-results.json && flashlight report flashlight-results.json
